title: Authors and Citation
text: Benninghoff J (2024). quantrr: Quantify Report (Technology) Risk. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/jabenninghoff/quantrr, https://jabenninghoff.github.io/quantrr/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {quantrr: Quantify and Report (Technology) Risk},   author = {John Benninghoff},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0,     https://github.com/jabenninghoff/quantrr},   url = {https://jabenninghoff.github.io/quantrr/}, }

title: Quantify and Report (Technology) Risk
text: Quantify Report (Technology) Risk: streamlined tool designed make easier quantify risk using expert estimation. Given expert estimates loss frequency magnitude, generate report forecasts losses risk aggregate.

title: Quantify and Report (Technology) Risk
text: can install development version quantrr GitHub : using renv:

title: Calculate Risk — calc_risk
text: Calculate risk using Poisson log-normal model. number events per time period calculated using rpois(runs, lambda) total loss time period using sum(rlnorm(events, meanlog, sdlog)).

title: Calculate Risk — calc_risk
text: risk Risk name (string) lambda Parameter passed rpois() meanlog Parameter passed rlnorm() sdlog Parameter passed rlnorm() runs Number simulations

title: Calculate Risk — calc_risk
text: tibble runs rows containing number events (events), total value losses (losses) run.

title: Calculate Log Normal Parameters — lnorm_param
text: Calculate parameters log normal distribution estimated 0.05 0.95 quantile. Also calculate fractional difference estimated median value (0.5 quantile) median value calculated 0.05 0.95 values.

title: Calculate Log Normal Parameters — lnorm_param
text: p05 "low" value, 0.05 quantile. p95 "high" value, 0.95 quantile. p50 likely value, 0.5 quantile.

title: Calculate Log Normal Parameters — lnorm_param
text: list including meanlog sdlog parameters, well fractional difference estimated actual median (0.5 quantile), mdiff.

title: quantrr: Quantify and Report (Technology) Risk — quantrr-package
text: streamlined tool designed make easier quantify risk using expert estimation. Given expert estimates loss frequency magnitude, generate report forecasts losses risk aggregate.

title: quantrr: Quantify and Report (Technology) Risk — quantrr-package
quantrr 0.1.0
text: Initial release. Implements basic package structure two core functions: lnorm_param(): calculate parameters log normal distribution 0.05 0.95 quantiles calc_risk(): quantify risk using Poisson distribution loss event frequency, log-normal distribution loss event magnitude
